name: 09-rise-divtober-2022
title: 09. Rise - Divtober 2022
description: This entry for #divtober attempted to incorporate perspective and use the rotates (X, Y, and Z) with perspective and perspective-origin to provide depth, in this case, to show a tower rising into the sky.
js: /* This entry was an attempt at trying to incorporate perspective and using the rotates (X, Y, and Z) with perspective and perspective-origin to provide depth, in this case, to show a tower rising into the sky.There is a time-lapse video of making this piece at https://youtu.be/Ak6DSrM8AJw */
